title: Ok, Everybody Be Cool!
content: Photo by Mike Mozard via Flickr (https://www.flickr.com/photos/jeepersmedia/) For the old house and non AC people there is (literally) only one burning question: What are your best fan strategies? AgentRocket has started the discussion, come see what people are suggesting! But please pick up a pack of something cold before coming over, please and thank you!
author: Brandon Blatcher
